column2: Sleep is was all true Hispanics thrive for.  The Siesta is a time-honored tradition that shall be kept around. To celebrate our greatness we shall have the greatest siesta ever!  TO KING YBARRA!
We must gather all the kings men for the army, so that we can get SO MUCH WIN!  We will call these new conscripts, the chupie division.
IM ON MY KNEES BRITIAN, PLEASE GIVE ME THAT PORT, I NEED IT SO BAD MMMMMMMMMM PLEASE.
We must accepted the Darks and the Uluvars of the world to be able to keep up with the rest of the great powers.  Feel that? Thats true.
These no good Moroccans keep interrupting my siestas!  They must be taught the ways of the slumber, then they can really be accepted into the greater Spanish society.
ON SALE FOR CHEAP, BALKAN FEMBOYS IN YOUR AREA, GET NOW WHILE STILL CHEAP!!!!
RED AND BLACK I DRESS, EAGLE ON MY CHEST, IM PROUD TO BE AN ALBANIAN!!!!
I mean, they don't even wanna be with spain you know what I'm sayin my man, like they should be Italian and shit fr fr.  Link up for real, for my legions and shit, ROME TILL I DIE!!!
Do we let these silly little guys do it?
Awww look at the little guy, of course he can have it!
putos negros, odio los negros los considero la raza inferior
ME WHEN I SEE THE 10/10 GYATT WALKING BY
What about dat prick's face when he saw the gyatt?
